news_header: Meritage Homes reported $1.61 billion in revenue for Q4 2024, a 2.4% decrease from last year, with an EPS of $4.72, significantly surpassing expectations.
news_text: For the quarter ending December 2024, Meritage Homes (MTH) reported revenues of $1.61 billion, a decrease of 2.4% compared to the same period last year. The earnings per share (EPS) was $4.72, up from $2.69 a year ago, exceeding the consensus EPS estimate of $2.21 by 113.57%. The reported revenue also surpassed the Zacks Consensus Estimate of $1.57 billion by 2.80%. Analysts emphasize the importance of key financial metrics in assessing a company's health, which helps investors project stock performance. Additionally, Zacks Investment Research highlights 7 elite stocks from their list of strong buys, which have historically outperformed the market.
